sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Llyfer gweddi gyffredin, a gwenidogaeth y sacramentau, ac eraill gynneddfau a ceremoniau yn Eglwys Loegr.. Book of Common Prayer Welsh Bible O.T. Psalms. Welsh 1599. Church of England.
PAGINATION
gan Ddeputiaid Christopher Barker Printiwr i ardderchoccaf Fawrhydi y Frenhines., Printiedig yn Llundain: 1599.
"Psalmau Dafydd o'r vn cyfieithiad a'r Beibl cyffredin" has separate t.p. and continuous register. Titles within ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 165), headpieces, tailpieces, initials, printed marginalia. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

PAGINATION

"Psalmau Dafydd o'r vn cyfieithiad a'r Beibl cyffredin" has separate t.p. and continuous register. Titles within ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 165), headpieces, tailpieces, initials, printed marginalia. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
